content: **update ** there was a mistake in the directions for the heel flap please see the new corrected version for the correct dimensions sorry for any inconvenience 8 may 2012 my cable sock for the march ska sockdown this may look rather complex but in reality there are only two different types of cables here - two knit crossing over a purl or two knit crossing over two knit i would encourage everyone to try cabling without a needle but feel free to use any help you may need since this has not been test knitted extensively please feel free to let me know should you encounter any problems or difficulties you are welcome to knit this for personal use but please do not use this for commercial purposes and please do not translate and publish the pattern without my permission if you are interested in a russian version of this pattern please contact nataliyam person who has kindly made a translation
